title: Video: Unknown Mortal Orchestra – Ffunny Ffrends
body:
**[Unknown Mortal Orchestra](http://www.facebook.com/unknownmortalorchestra)** have just dropped the official video for ‘**_Ffunny Ffriends_**’, one of the many highlights from their self-titled debut record. The video itself is a bit of a disappointment, almost coming across as a series of fashion images rather than a music video. Regardless, it’s a welcome fleshing of **Unknown Mortal Orchestra**’s world, even if it isn’t fully realised.

Stream the video below.

Regardless, it’s a welcome fleshing of Unknown Mortal Orchestra’s world, \[…\]
